EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome To The VMTurbo Alliances Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{Lead.First Name}},
Welcome to the VMTurbo Alliance Program! We are excited to work with you! Someone from our alliances team will reach out to you shortly.
Regards,
The VMTurbo Partner Team
